examples.example: 可爱的小孩子们在海洋馆里兴奋地看着鲨鱼游来游去。

translate.english: Cute children are excitedly watching the sharks swimming around in the aquarium.

examples.example: 勇敢的潜水员和鲨鱼在美丽的海底和谐共处。

translate.english: Brave divers and sharks live in harmony at the beautiful seabed.

examples.example: 勇敢的探险家在海洋中与鲨鱼一起探索神秘的海底世界。

translate.english: Brave explorers explore the mysterious underwater world together with sharks in the ocean.
